tests.name: ESLint Configuration - Deprecated Options Fixed
tests.details: ESLint rules properly configured to warn instead of error
tests.expected: Non-blocking warnings for React and Next.js rules

tests.name: Statistics Display - Dash Prevention
tests.details: Missing NaN protection or fallback values in statistics
tests.expected: Numbers always displayed instead of dashes

tests.name: Mobile Navigation - Language Switcher Visibility
tests.details: Missing mobile navigation components or responsive styles
tests.actual: Desktop switcher: true, Mobile switcher: false, Menu btn: true

tests.name: Success Page - Template Loading State
tests.details: Loading state properly managed with emergency loader and template renderer
tests.expected: Templates show content instead of loading state
tests.actual: Loading fix: true, Emergency loader: true

tests.name: Browser Integration - Live Testing
tests.actual: Error: Navigation timeout of 10000 ms exceeded
